title: BMMI01
description: Base foil is less than set level.
reasons_remedies: The forming film gets low on the forming film mounting unit.
Insert new forming film reel on forming film mounting unit.
The sensor is not working correctly.
Check the sensor and set it correctly.
Refer Chapter "Maintenance" > Section " Setting the Diffuse Reflection Sensor"

media.caption: Base foil Mounting and switch Foil Location

text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMMI01
Error Code 01
Category: BMMI
Title: BMMI01
Alarm Message: Base Foil 1 Low Level
Description: Base foil is less than set level.
Reason & Remedy:
1. The forming film gets low on the forming film mounting unit.
2. Insert new forming film reel on forming film mounting unit.
3. The sensor is not working correctly.
4. Check the sensor and set it correctly.
5. Refer Chapter "Maintenance" > Section " Setting the Diffuse Reflection Sensor"
Visual References:
- Base foil Mounting and switch Foil Location
